ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $User.Id !='005300000042rPL' && $RecordType.DeveloperName !='Technical_Issue' && ISpickval( Type ,'') && ( ISpickval( Origin ,'Phone') || ISpickval( Origin ,'Web') || ISpickval( Origin ,'Fax') || ISpickval( Origin ,'Email')) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed as Duplicate') )
